titleInfo.title: Three-Ring Circus at Hatch Show Print

mods.accessCondition: This digital image is the property of the Country Music Hall of FameÂ® and Museum and is protected by U.S. and international copyright laws. mods.abstract: Three color window card (blue, pink, and orange on white) announcing a three ring circus, presented by Hatch Show Print Productions, plus one orange cat, each and every day at the 5th Ave Theatre. Poster features a metal photoplate of a lion and a woodcut of a show tent.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
recordInfo.recordOrigin: Record has been transformed into MODS v3.5 from a Qualified Dublin Core record by the Digital Library of Tennessee, a service hub of the Digital Public Library of America.
